title: Software Engineer
description:
Company: GoodSpace AI
 



 Location: Remote
 



 Compensation: ‚Çπ6\\-9 LPA
 



 Experience: 0 ‚Äì 3 years
 



 Type: Full\\-time
 



  





 About GoodSpace AI:
 



 GoodSpace AI is redefining how companies hire. Our AI\\-driven recruitment platform helps founders and HR teams find, evaluate, and hire qualified talent within 24 hours ‚Äî eliminating the need for endless screening and manual interviews.
 



 We‚Äôre a fast\\-growing startup backed by strong technology and passionate people who believe in making hiring 10x faster and smarter.
 



  





 Role Overview:
 



 We‚Äôre looking for a Software Engineer to join our core product team and help us build scalable, intelligent systems that power our AI recruitment engine. You‚Äôll work on real problems ‚Äî from automating candidate evaluation to building AI\\-driven matching pipelines ‚Äî while contributing to a modern, high\\-performance product stack.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities:
 



 \\-Design, build, and maintain scalable APIs and microservices for our AI hiring platform.
 



 \\-Work closely with product and AI teams to integrate ML/LLM\\-based features into production.
 



 \\-Write clean, efficient, and testable code following best practices.
 



 \\-Optimize system performance and reliability as our user base grows rapidly.
 



 \\-Participate in code reviews, architecture discussions, and feature planning.
 



 \\-Collaborate cross\\-functionally with designers, data scientists, and backend engineers.
 



  





 What You‚Äôll Need:
 



 \\-0‚Äì3 years of experience in backend or full\\-stack development.
 



 \\-Strong command of Python, Node.js, or Go (Python preferred).
 



 \\-Experience with RESTful APIs, PostgreSQL/MySQL, and Docker.
 



 \\-Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure) and CI/CD pipelines.
 



 \\-Good understanding of data structures, algorithms, and system design.
 



 \\-Bonus: exposure to AI/ML models, FastAPI, or LangChain.
 



  





 Why Join Us:
 



 \\-Work on cutting\\-edge AI\\-driven hiring technology used by top startups and enterprises.
 



 \\-Join a fast\\-paced, product\\-first environment where you can see your impact directly.
 



 \\-Competitive pay, flexibility, and the opportunity to grow with the company.
 



 \\-Collaborate with passionate builders and problem\\-solvers who are transforming hiring.
 



  





 If you love building scalable systems, working with AI technologies, and solving real\\-world challenges ‚Äî we‚Äôd love to meet you.

title: Staff Software Engineer
description:
**About Bazaarvoice**
 At Bazaarvoice, we create smart shopping experiences. Through our expansive global network, product\\-passionate community \\& enterprise technology, we connect thousands of brands and retailers with billions of consumers. Our solutions enable brands to connect with consumers and collect valuable user\\-generated content, at an unprecedented scale. This content achieves global reach by leveraging our extensive and ever\\-expanding retail, social \\& search syndication network. And we make it easy for brands \\& retailers to gain valuable business insights from real\\-time consumer feedback with intuitive tools and dashboards. The result is smarter shopping: loyal customers, increased sales, and improved products.
   

  

 The problem we are trying to solve : Brands and retailers struggle to make real connections with consumers. It's a challenge to deliver trustworthy and inspiring content in the moments that matter most during the discovery and purchase cycle. The result? Time and money spent on content that doesn't attract new consumers, convert them, or earn their long\\-term loyalty.
   

  

 Our brand promise : closing the gap between brands and consumers.
   

  

 Founded in 2005, Bazaarvoice is headquartered in Austin, Texas with offices in North America, Europe, Asia and Australia.
   

  

 It‚Äôs official: Bazaarvoice is a Great Place to Work in the US , Australia, India, Lithuania, France, Germany and the UK!
   

  

**About The Team**
 Join Bazaarvoice\\- Our real time API's are built for high scalability, supporting both API and display needs for over 12,500 brands and retailers. Whether it's real\\-time or bulk processing, the challenges are complex‚Äîand if you're excited to be part of this journey and help work with a team of 20\\+ engineers, this is the team for you.
   

  

**How You‚Äôll Make An Impact**
 Your role at Bazaarvoice will drive software initiatives from conception to delivery, while driving engineering best practices and helping mentor talent.
   

  

 You will be designing and delivering solutions to scale and innovate on the World's largest Network of Brands and Retailers. From enhancing product matching algorithms to improving tools that connect Consumer Generated Content between brands and retailers, your work will have a direct impact on making BV systems smarter.
   

  

**The Must Have Skills That Matter**
 8\\+ years‚Äô experience building software in a professional environment
   

  

 Strong software development knowledge in different programming/scripting languages such as Java, C\\+\\+, Python, or similar language
   

  

 Experience building high\\-performance, scalable algorithms. Understanding of Agile / Lean software development methodologies
   

  

**Experience With Amazon Web Services Or Other Cloud Platform**
 You are hands\\-on and willing to dig into tough problems, willing to explore new areas, learn quickly, and apply your skills to challenging design issues
   

  

**Why You‚Äôll Love Working with Us?**
* Work with cutting\\-edge technology in a collaborative, global team
* Competitive salary \\+ good benefits (insurance, annual leave, bonuses, referral rewards, and more).
* We‚Äôre Great Place to Work Certified (4 years in a row!).
* Hybrid work model (3 days in office ‚Äì Prestige Technology Pacific, Bellandur).


**Interview Process**
* Hiring Manager Meeting: Team, values \\& culture check.
* Tech Round 1: Coding interview with our team.
* Tech Round 2: System design discussion.
* Final Round: Chat with HR/Senior Leadership.


 Why join Bazaarvoice?
   

  

 Customer is key
   

  

 We see our own success through our customers‚Äô outcomes.
   

  

 We approach every situation with a customer first mindset.
   

  

 Transparency \\& Integrity Builds Trust
   

  

 We believe in the power of authentic feedback because it‚Äôs in our DNA.
   

  

 We do the right thing when faced with hard choices. Transparency and trust accelerate our collective performance.
   

  

 Passionate Pursuit of Performance
   

  

 Our energy is contagious, because we hire for passion, drive \\& curiosity.
   

  

 We love what we do, and because we‚Äôre laser focused on our mission.
   

  

 Innovation over Imitation
   

  

 We seek to innovate as we are not content with the status quo.
   

  

 We embrace agility and experimentation as an advantage.
   

  

 Stronger Together
   

  

 We bring our whole selves to the mission and find value in diverse perspectives.
   

  

 We champion what‚Äôs best for Bazaarvoice before individuals or teams.
   

  

 As a stronger company we build a stronger community.
   

  

 Commitment to diversity and inclusion
   

  

 Bazaarvoice provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all team members and applicants according to their experience, talent, and qualifications for the job without regard to race, color, national origin, religion, age, disability, sex (including pregnancy, gender stereotyping, and marital status), sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information, military/veteran status, or any other category protected by federal, state, or local law in every location in which the company has facilities. Bazaarvoice believes that diversity and an inclusive company culture are key drivers of creativity, innovation and performance. Furthermore, a diverse workforce and the maintenance of an atmosphere that welcomes versatile perspectives will enhance our ability to fulfill our vision of creating the world‚Äôs smartest network of consumers, brands, and retailers.
   

  

**As part of our hiring process, a background check will be conducted. This will be done with your consent and will only include information relevant to the job.**
 We may use artificial intelligence (AI) tools to support parts of the hiring process, such as reviewing applications, analyzing resumes, or assessing responses. These tools assist our recruitment team but do not replace human judgment. Final hiring decisions are ultimately made by humans. If you would like more information about how your data is processed, please contact us.

title: UI QA Automation - Principal Engineer Role
description:
**Experiences: 10 ‚Äì 15 Years** 




**Notice Period: Immediate Joiner** 




**Mandatory Skills: Automation, Playwright, Performance testing and Architecture experiences.** 




  





**Job Description:** 




 Architectural and Strategic Leadership
 


* Define Testing Architecture: Architect and drive the implementation of next\\-generation automation and performance testing frameworks, ensuring high scalability, robustness, and maintainability across all product lines.
* Best Practices and Standards: Establish and enforce quality engineering best practices, coding standards, and continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines across the entire testing organization.
* System Integration: Lead technical evaluations and integration of new testing tools and technologies to improve efficiency, coverage, and time\\-to\\-market.
* Mentorship and Coaching: Act as a technical mentor and coach for Senior and Lead Engineers, raising the overall technical acumen and quality mindset of the team.



 Core Technical Focus Areas
 


* **Deep Expertise in Playwright** 
 : Own the design and implementation of robust, resilient end\\-to\\-end (E2E) automation frameworks using Playwright (TypeScript/JavaScript). Drive innovative solutions for testing complex, single\\-page applications (SPAs) and micro\\-frontend architectures.
* **Performance Engineering with k6** 
 : Establish and execute a comprehensive performance testing strategy. Design and run high\\-volume load, stress, and spike tests using k6 (or similar modern tools), analyze results, and partner with development teams to identify and resolve critical performance bottlenecks.
* Quality Metrics \\& Reporting: Define and track key performance indicators (KPIs) for quality, including defect trends, test execution time, and stability, creating automated dashboards for executive visibility.



 Required Qualifications
 


* Experience: 10\\+ years of progressive experience in Software Development and Quality Engineering roles, with at least 3 years operating at a Principal Engineer level.
* Educational Background: Bachelor‚Äôs or master‚Äôs degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related technical field.
* Automation Mastery: Expert\\-level, hands\\-on experience in building and scaling complex end\\-to\\-end automation frameworks, with deep practical knowledge of Playwright.
* Performance Expertise: Proven track record of designing, scripting, and executing large\\-scale performance and load testing initiatives using k6 or equivalent modern tools (e.g., Gatling, JMeter).
* Programming Languages: Strong proficiency in at least one modern language essential for automation (e.g., TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, or Java).
* System Knowledge: Extensive experience with testing complex distributed systems, microservices, cloud environments
* CI/CD: Expertise in integrating automation and performance tests into DevOps pipelines (e.g., GitHub Actions, Jenkins, GitLab CI).

title: Student Intern
description:
**Headline: Internship Opportunity: Build the Future of PropTech with AI \\& Automation** 
 üöÄ
 



**Company:** 
 Stealthmode Startup
 



**Role:** 
 Full Stack Developer Intern (PropTech / Automation)
 



**Location:** 
 Chennai (T. Nagar) / Coimbatore / Remote (Hybrid)
 



**Duration:** 
 Jan \\- Jun 2026 (4\\-6 Months)
 



  





**üëã The Gist** 




 We are looking for a
 **Student Intern** 
 who wants to do more than just fix bugs. At Keyarite, we are building a web\\-based
 **Auction and Asset Reconstruction (ARC) platform** 
 to modernize how property foreclosures are managed.
 



 Right now, the industry is bogged down by manual data entry and paperwork. We are changing that. We are building an end\\-to\\-end automated workflow that connects buyers, banks, and field agents using AI, OCR, and seamless backend integration.
 



  





**üõ† What You Will Actually Build** 




 You won't be fetching coffee; or fixing the bugs or entering excel data; you will be shipping code.
 



 Here is the mission:
 


* **Automation \\& Data Integrity:** 
 Build scripts to scrape data and a "Reserve Price Checker" using
 **OCR** 
 to catch pricing discrepancies in paper ads.
* **Field Agent Portal:** 
 Develop a mobile\\-friendly dashboard where agents can upload photos and valuations from the site, killing the manual data entry loop.
* **Geo\\-Tagging Solutions:** 
 Solve the "vague address" problem by creating logic to generate accurate Lat/Long coordinates for our agents.
* **AI \\& ML Integration:** 
 Work on
 **Agentic AI** 
 frameworks for social media marketing, build a basic ML model to classify properties (Posh/Developing/Normal), and implement smart CRM workflows.
* **Workflow Logic:** 
 Connect the dots between our CRM and bank portals to route leads automatically.



  





**üíª The Stack \\& Skills** 



* **Frontend:** 
 React or Vue
* **Backend:** 
 Python (Django) or Node.js
* **AI/Data:** 
 Experience with Web Scraping, OCR (Tesseract/Google Vision), and an understanding of Agentic AI / LLMs.
* **Database:** 
 SQL.
* **You:** 
 Currently enrolled in a Bachelor's/Master's program. You see a manual process and your first instinct is to write a script to automate it.



  





**üéÅ What‚Äôs in it for you?** 



* **Mentorship:** 
 Work directly with an industry leader who will guide your growth.
* **Real Impact:** 
 Your code will drive business decisions, not just sit in a repository.
* **Stipend:** 
 Paid internship with a certificate upon completion. (It is the experience which will be more valuable than the stipend)



  





**üì© How to Apply** 
 If you are game to solve real\\-world problems with code, send your resume and a link to your GitHub/Portfolio to \\[Insert Email/Link].

title: Senior QA
description:
**About Commotion** 




 Commotion builds enterprise\\-grade platforms across AI Workers, Voice AI, and Marketing Automation, powering high\\-scale, mission\\-critical customer engagement. Our systems operate across multiple channels and demand exceptional quality, reliability, and speed.
 



  





 We‚Äôre looking for a hands\\-on QA who thrives in complex systems, collaborates deeply with cross\\-functional teams, and takes ownership of quality across products.
 



  





**Role Overview** 




 As a Senior QA Engineer, you will work closely with QA peers, Automation QAs, Product, and Engineering teams to ensure high\\-quality releases across our AI Workers, Voice AI, Marketing Automation, and core enterprise platform.
 



 You‚Äôll play a key role in defining test strategies, validating AI\\-driven workflows, and ensuring that both manual and automated testing efforts are aligned with business priorities.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




 Work closely with QA team members and Automation QAs to maintain a strong, unified quality culture
 



  





 Test and validate:
 



 AI Workers \\& AI\\-driven workflows
 



 Voice AI systems (flows, edge cases, integrations)
 



 Marketing Automation journeys, campaigns, and multi\\-channel execution
 



 Enterprise platform features (scalability, permissions, reliability)
 



  





**Collaborate with Automation QAs to:** 




 Define and review target test case coverage
 



 Decide what should be automated vs. manually tested
 



 Design, execute, and maintain test plans, test cases, and regression suites
 



 Actively participate in release readiness, risk assessment, and production validation
 



 Identify gaps in testing, edge cases, and failure scenarios‚Äîespecially for AI and automation\\-heavy features
 



 Work cross\\-functionally with Product and Engineering to clarify requirements and acceptance criteria
 



  





**Expectations \\& Work Ethic** 




 Operate with a high sense of ownership and accountability
 



 Be flexible during critical release cycles, where extended hours or occasional weekend support may be required to ensure production stability
 



 Balance speed and quality while operating in a fast\\-moving enterprise environment
 



 (We value outcomes, responsibility, and reliability‚Äîthis role is suited for someone comfortable stepping up when it matters most.)
 



  





**Required Qualifications** 




 5\\+ years of experience in QA / Software Testing for complex platforms
 



 Strong experience testing enterprise SaaS products
 



**Hands\\-on experience with:** 




 Manual testing and test case design
 



 Collaboration with automation teams
 



 Strong understanding of system integrations, workflows, and data\\-driven testing
 



 Excellent communication and collaboration skills
 



 Preferred Qualifications
 



 Experience testing AI\\-driven systems, automation engines, or Voice AI
 



 Familiarity with marketing automation platforms or multi\\-channel messaging
 



 Exposure to test automation frameworks and CI/CD pipelines
 



 Experience in high\\-scale, multi\\-tenant systems
 



  





**Why Join Commotion** 




 Work on cutting\\-edge AI and automation products
 



 High ownership and real impact on product quality
 



 Collaborate with strong engineering, AI, and product teams
 



 Opportunity to shape QA strategy across multiple platforms

title: MT5 Quant Developer (Intern)
description:
**COMPANY DESCRIPTION** 




 QuantTraderTools offers professional automation software designed to enhance workflow efficiency on popular communication and trading platforms. The company specializes in enabling seamless copy trading signals to MT5 using the Quant Copier and synchronizing messages across Telegram and Discord with Message Copier. Focused on innovation, QuantTraderTools supports traders and technology enthusiasts to automate processes for improved precision and speed. Check out: quanttradertools.com/quantcopier
 



  





**üéØ ROLE OVERVIEW** 




 This is a full\\-time, remote internship opportunity for an
 **MT5 Python / Quant Developer** 
 . Your responsibilities will include developing, testing, and optimizing features for our MT5 Quant Copier software. You will collaborate with the team to develop a test suite and build new features to improve the existing feature set of the QuantCopier for MT5 software.
 



**Duration** 

 : 3 months internship
 




  





**üéì REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS** 



* Ideally you Completed B.Tech or M.Sc in Computer Science, IT, Data Science, or related field or atleast in your final semester now
* Ability to leverage AI powered software development with Cursor IDE or Github CoPilot
* Proficiency in Trading concepts and a deep understanding of MT5 platform functionality
* Strong expertise in Python and familiarity with
 **MetaTrader5** 
 (library). MQL5 expertise is a bonus
* Analytical mindset with strong problem\\-solving and communication skills
* Strong skills in Quantitative Analytics and Quantitative Finance
* Good exposure or familiarity with Github Actions is a plus
* Prior experience of using open source LLM (Nvidia NIM) for text summarization / classification is a plus



  





**üí∏ SALARY( ‚Çπ )** 



* Probation Period stipend \\- 5000 ‚Çπ per month ( First 30 days )
* Normal Stipend \\- 10,000 ‚Çπ per month



  





**üí™ WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR** 



* Self\\-motivated individuals eager to explore quantitative / dev. roles in automated trading
* Passion to develop features to a commercial software to make traders live easier
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and ability to work independently
* Excellent communication skills in English or Tamil
* Responsive and proactive in remote collaboration and prompt respectful communication
* Access to a personal computer/laptop (BYOD)
* Minimum availability:
 **40 hours/week**



  





**üåü Unique ASSESSMENT PROCESS** 



* üö´ No interviews, no quizzes ‚Äì Just show us your skills!

title: QA Architect (Playwright | Performance | Architecture)
description:
Principal ‚Äì Automation Engineer Role
 



  





**Experiences: 10 ‚Äì 15 Years** 




**Notice Period: Immediate Joiner** 




**Mandatory Skills: Automation, Playwright, Performance testing and Architecture experiences.** 




  





**Job Description:** 




 Architectural and Strategic Leadership
 


* Define Testing Architecture: Architect and drive the implementation of next\\-generation automation and performance testing frameworks, ensuring high scalability, robustness, and maintainability across all product lines.
* Best Practices and Standards: Establish and enforce quality engineering best practices, coding standards, and continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines across the entire testing organization.
* System Integration: Lead technical evaluations and integration of new testing tools and technologies to improve efficiency, coverage, and time\\-to\\-market.
* Mentorship and Coaching: Act as a technical mentor and coach for Senior and Lead Engineers, raising the overall technical acumen and quality mindset of the team.



 Core Technical Focus Areas
 


* **Deep Expertise in Playwright** 
 : Own the design and implementation of robust, resilient end\\-to\\-end (E2E) automation frameworks using Playwright (TypeScript/JavaScript). Drive innovative solutions for testing complex, single\\-page applications (SPAs) and micro\\-frontend architectures.
* **Performance Engineering with k6** 
 : Establish and execute a comprehensive performance testing strategy. Design and run high\\-volume load, stress, and spike tests using k6 (or similar modern tools), analyze results, and partner with development teams to identify and resolve critical performance bottlenecks.
* Quality Metrics \\& Reporting: Define and track key performance indicators (KPIs) for quality, including defect trends, test execution time, and stability, creating automated dashboards for executive visibility.



 Required Qualifications
 


* Experience: 10\\+ years of progressive experience in Software Development and Quality Engineering roles, with at least 3 years operating at a Principal Engineer level.
* Educational Background: Bachelor‚Äôs or master‚Äôs degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related technical field.
* Automation Mastery: Expert\\-level, hands\\-on experience in building and scaling complex end\\-to\\-end automation frameworks, with deep practical knowledge of Playwright.
* Performance Expertise: Proven track record of designing, scripting, and executing large\\-scale performance and load testing initiatives using k6 or equivalent modern tools (e.g., Gatling, JMeter).
* Programming Languages: Strong proficiency in at least one modern language essential for automation (e.g., TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, or Java).
* System Knowledge: Extensive experience with testing complex distributed systems, microservices, cloud environments
* CI/CD: Expertise in integrating automation and performance tests into DevOps pipelines (e.g., GitHub Actions, Jenkins, GitLab CI).

title: DevSecOps Architect (Co-Founder)
description:
**Company Description**

 Zelyo AI is a cutting\\-edge autonomous AI agent designed to bridge the gap between observability and action in the modern DevSecOps landscape. With advanced capabilities such as multi\\-signal correlation, it synthesizes metrics, logs, and traces across Kubernetes (K8s) clusters to identify and resolve critical issues. It leverages LLM\\-driven intelligence to execute Autonomous GitOps, proactively generating and submitting precise configuration or code changes via Pull Requests. Zelyo AI ensures proactive security and stability by identifying and mitigating vulnerabilities and performance regressions within CI/CD pipelines.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a full\\-time remote role for a DevSecOps Engineer. The DevSecOps Engineer will contribute to the development and implementation of secure and efficient software delivery pipelines. Key responsibilities include developing scalable backend systems, integrating security throughout the CI/CD process, building automation tools, and ensuring the stability and security of applications in complex IT environments. The engineer will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to enhance the overall DevSecOps strategy and architecture.
   




**Qualifications**
* Strong foundation in Computer Science, with a focus on algorithms, data structures, and system design.
* Proficiency in Back\\-End Web Development and Software Development, with experience building and maintaining robust applications.
* Solid understanding of Programming and Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles.
* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines, automation, and continuous delivery practices.
* Experience with Kubernetes and working in cloud\\-based environments.
* Knowledge of security best practices and tools for mitigating vulnerabilities in DevSecOps.
* Strong problem\\-solving capabilities and ability to work collaboratively in a remote team environment.
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field preferred.
